attributes.action: NO to Grandparents Rights in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
It has been widely broadcast that the government is looking into possibly bringing in a form of Grandparents Rights in the future. We want the petition to show that people in the UK do not want or need this legal overhaul and would like the government to drop their plans for this.

It is our opinion that no-one has rights or entitlements over anyone else's child.
